name: Forgotten World (itch)
description:
Are you ready for adventure? Explore procedurally generated maps/dungeons, gather loot and defeat mighty enemies!

Inspired by many RPGs, I want to create a world players can explore and learn about, while becoming stronger and overcoming greater challenges. The project is still in an early stage, but I want to hear what you think about it :)

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Attack towards mouse position - Left Click
  • Toogle Inventory - Tab/I
  • Interact - E
  • Use item (Inside inventory) - Right Click

Expect bugs!

Future Features:

  • Multiplayer
  • Item rarity
  • More enemies
  • More items
  • More loot
  • New dungeons/biomes/areas
  • Crafting
